languages.text: "...да и разве есть разница, какую маску носить? Любой из них можно овладеть, вытесать под себя..." {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и замирает — словно сломанная игрушка.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка

traits.locale_text: "...и разве есть разница, какую маску носить? Любой из них можно обучиться, любую из них — вытесать под себя..." {n}Культистка прикрывает глаза на долю секунды. Ее ресницы дрожат.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка

languages.text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}
languages.original_text: "...да и разве есть разница, какую маску носить? Любой из них можно овладеть, вытесать под себя..." {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и замирает — словно сломанная игрушка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be mastered, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still, not unlike a broken toy.{/n}
"Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be mastered, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still, not unlike a broken toy.{/n}

"Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}
"Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}
"Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

languages.text: "Zudem: Ist es denn wichtig, welche Maske man trägt? Jede Maske lässt sich umgestalten, umformen, so dass sie perfekt sitzt ..." {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen und wird still. Sie wirkt fast wie ein defektes Spielzeug.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zudem: Ist es denn wichtig, welche Maske man trägt? Jede Maske lässt sich umgestalten, umformen, so dass sie perfekt sitzt ..." {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen und wird still. Sie wirkt fast wie ein defektes Spielzeug.{/n}

languages.text: «Además, ¿qué importa la máscara que llevemos? Todas se pueden modificar y amoldar a la perfección...». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos y se queda inmóvil. Parece un juguete roto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Además, ¿qué importa la máscara que llevemos? Todas se pueden modificar y amoldar a la perfección...». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos y se queda inmóvil. Parece un juguete roto.{/n}

languages.text: 「それに、どんな仮面を被っていても問題ないでしょう？どんな仮面も作り直すことができるし、完璧にフィットするように成型することだってできる…」{n}キベラは目を閉じて動きを止める。まるで壊れたおもちゃのように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それに、どんな仮面を被っていても問題ないでしょう？どんな仮面も作り直すことができるし、完璧にフィットするように成型することだってできる…」{n}キベラは目を閉じて動きを止める。まるで壊れたおもちゃのように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: “另外，戴什么样的面具，又有什么关系呢？所有面具都可以重新塑造，变成完美的样子……”{n}绮贝菈闭上双眼，一动不动，看起来像个坏了的玩具一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “另外，戴什么样的面具，又有什么关系呢？所有面具都可以重新塑造，变成完美的样子……”{n}绮贝菈闭上双眼，一动不动，看起来像个坏了的玩具一样。{/n}

languages.text: « D'ailleurs, quelle importance cela peut-il bien avoir ? Tout masque peut être refaçonné et remodelé à l'envi... » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux et se fige. Elle ressemblerait presque à une poupée brisée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « D'ailleurs, quelle importance cela peut-il bien avoir ? Tout masque peut être refaçonné et remodelé à l'envi... » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux et se fige. Elle ressemblerait presque à une poupée brisée.{/n}

languages.text: "Ayrıca taktığın maskenin hangisi olduğunun bir önemi var mı? Tüm maskeleri yeni bir biçime, mükemmel uyum sağlayacak bir kalıba sokabilirsin..." {n}Kibellah, gözlerini kısarak hareketsizce duruyor. Âdeta bozuk bir oyuncağı andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Besides, does it matter what mask one wears? Any mask can be refashioned, moulded into a perfect fit..." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes and goes still. She seems almost like a broken toy.{/n}
